bermudanSwaptionFramework

Interface BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLowerBoundEstimation, AbstractLowerBoundEstimationInputForUpperBound, AbstractLowerBoundEstimationWithoutCaching, AbstractUpperBoundEstimation, AndersenBroadieUpperBoundEstimation, DeltaHedgingUpperBound, SimpleLowerBoundEstimation, SimpleLowerBoundEstimationWithoutCaching

    public interface BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    Interface to enable valuation using different methods through this interface.
    Author:
    Lennart Quante

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable getValueEstimation(BermudanSwaption bermudanOption, double evaluationTime, net.finmath.montecarlo.interestrate.LIBORModelMonteCarloSimulationModel model, net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable triggerValues)
      Returns the value estimation of a given Bermudan option using a given LIBORMonteCarloModel and evaluation time.

    • Method Detail

      • getValueEstimation

        net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable getValueEstimation(BermudanSwaption bermudanOption,
                                                         double evaluationTime,
                                                         net.finmath.montecarlo.interestrate.LIBORModelMonteCarloSimulationModel model,
                                                         net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable triggerValues)
                                                  throws net.finmath.exception.CalculationException
        Returns the value estimation of a given Bermudan option using a given LIBORMonteCarloModel and evaluation time. The definition of the valuation method is part of the object implementing this interface.
        Parameters:
        bermudanOption - Given Bermudan option.
        model - The used LIBOR model.
        evaluationTime - The time on which the evaluation should be performed.
        triggerValues - to be used as externaly given
        Returns:
        The value random variable of bermudanOption.
        Throws:
        net.finmath.exception.CalculationException
